title: Is Jet Setting Your Style
posting_body: It seemed like the G4 was going to be a good deal until the price of jet fuel went through the roof.

Now you've got it hangered at the Van Nuys Airport and you need a place to crash that doesn't cost too much but meets your luxurious standards, at least until you can afford to fly back to St. Bart's.
The Executive House 1 bdrm can be your crash pad!
Bull market luxury for bear market prices, it's a controlled access building with great neighbors, and they were designed by one of the best teams in the business!
Stunning kitchens, modern bathrooms, wall to wall or walk in closets, spacious floor plans.
And how great will it be to relax by our sparkling pool, or in our Jacuzzi, while you've got a Kobe burger sizzling on the barbecue?

Convenient freeway access near the 101 and 405 Freeways puts you between the Van Nuys and Santa Monica airports, onsite laundry, attentive management, and walking distance from the gorgeous Sepulveda Dam Recreation Center.
